html:
For today only, B&H has a decent deal for Rainsberg Photo-X Backpacks.

There are two configurations: one with a touch lock and the other classic without the lock. The backpacks can hold a 17″ laptop and are designed for rough conditions.

There are various color options, so go to B&H Photovideo and check out all the options available for this pretty decent deal.

Rainsberg Photo-X Backpack with Touch Lock

  • Hard-Shell Exterior
  • Adjustable Interior Dividers
  • Compartments for Small Items
  • Dedicated Pocket for 17″ Laptop
  • Built-In Charger for USB Devices
  • Water-Resistant Materials
  • Fingerprint Touch Lock

Rainsberg Photo-X Backpack

  • Hard-Shell Exterior
  • Adjustable Interior Dividers
  • Compartments for Small Items
  • Dedicated Pocket for 17″ Laptop
  • Built-In Charger for USB Devices
  • Water-Resistant Materials

Thoroughly protect your photo and video gear with this Photo-X Backpack in graphite from Rainsberg. It has a hard-shell exterior and a structured interior designed to protect your sensitive gear from bumps and impacts. The interior compartments store and organize your tablet, cables, flash cards, and more. A dedicated pocket holds your 17″ laptop, and the adjustable dividers organize your photo and video equipment. The integrated charger keeps your USB or USB-C devices powered on the go.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
